references.paper_title: A survey of large language models
references.reason: This is a survey paper, providing a comprehensive overview of the existing large language models.

references.paper_title: Easyedit: An easy-to-use knowledge editing framework for large language models
references.reason: It introduces EasyEdit, the predecessor to EasyEdit2, and thus forms the foundation of the current work.
It introduces the Transformers library, a fundamental tool in the development and application of large language models.

references.paper_title: Steering llama 2 via contrastive activation addition
references.reason: This paper introduces contrastive activation addition (CAA), a key steering method used in EasyEdit2.
This provides a foundation for controlled text generation which is a fundamental technique for steering behaviors of language models.
